name.baseName: Aluminum electrolysis ; Liquid primary aluminum ; Prebaking ; Alumina for metallurgy ; 2007
铝电解 ; 液态原铝 ; 预焙 ; 冶金用氧化铝 ; 2007年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The described process relates to the production of liquid primary aluminum by the prebaking method, using alumina specifically processed for metallurgical applications. This industrial process is generally applied in the production of aluminum for use in diverse sectors such as construction, transportation, electrical systems, and consumer goods manufacturing. The data from 2007 reflects the technological state of the industry at that time and might guide the choice of technology or process assessment in historical analyses or comparisons with newer technologies.
所述工艺涉及使用预焙法生产冶金用氧化铝的液态原铝。这个工业过程通常用于生产应用于建筑、交通、电力系统和消费品制造等多个行业的铝材。2007年的数据反映了当时行业的技术状况，可用于指导历史分析选择技术或与新技术比较过程的评估。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The described process relates to the production of liquid primary aluminum by the prebaking method, using alumina specifically processed for metallurgical applications. This industrial process is generally applied in the production of aluminum for use in diverse sectors such as construction, transportation, electrical systems, and consumer goods manufacturing. The data from 2007 reflects the technological state of the industry at that time and might guide the choice of technology or process assessment in historical analyses or comparisons with newer technologies.
所述工艺涉及使用预焙法生产冶金用氧化铝的液态原铝。这个工业过程通常用于生产应用于建筑、交通、电力系统和消费品制造等多个行业的铝材。2007年的数据反映了当时行业的技术状况，可用于指导历史分析选择技术或与新技术比较过程的评估。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This LCA data set should be used with consideration of its technological and temporal relevance. Users must note that the data pertain to the prebaking electrolytic process for aluminum production in 2007 and may not reflect current technologies or environmental conditions. When applying this data set in broader environmental impact studies, users should account for any advances in technology and changes in emissions or energy efficiency that have occurred since 2007. Furthermore, researchers should ensure that the background LCA data from the CAS RCEES 2018 database is compatible with their study goals and that any significant differences in geographic, technological, or temporal scopes between the study and data source are appropriately addressed.
此LCA数据集的使用应考虑其技术和时间相关性。用户必须注意，数据涉及2007年预焙电解铝生产过程，可能不反映当前技术或环境条件。在将此数据集应用于更广泛的环境影响研究时，用户应计入自2007年以来可能发生的技术进步和排放或能效变化。此外，研究人员应确保来自CAS RCEES 2018数据库的背景LCA数据与其研究目标兼容，并且应适当处理研究与数据来源之间可能存在的地理、技术或时间范围的显著差异。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
